title: Cate Blanchett joins women taking over Cannes red carpet
text:
Cate Blanchett joins women taking over Cannes red carpet 1:58pm IST - 00:50
Film stars Cate Blanchett, Salma Hayek and Marion Cotillard were among 82 women who made a symbolic walk up the red carpet at the Cannes Film Festival on Saturday (May 12), in a demonstration of solidarity for women struggling for a voice in the movie industry. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
